Package controllers

Class GameWindowController

java.lang.Object
controllers.GameWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>
public class GameWindowController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>
This class is a controller designed for ThatsLife! game, from CCPROG3 - DLSU CCS. This controller controls the main game window, given the ThatsLife instance model.
Author:
Adriel Isaiah V. Amoguis

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameWindowController​(ThatsLife game)
    This constructor creates an instance of the controller using the game parameter as its active game.

  • Method Summary

    void displayAlert​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String header, java.lang.String prompt, boolean willWait)
    This method displays an alert box based on the given parameters.
    int displayDecision​(java.lang.String prompt, java.lang.String[] choices)
    This method shows an alert box that prompts the user to make a choice via a drop-down menu.
    void displayPrompt​(java.lang.String prompt)
    This method shows a prompt message to the user by printing it to the message prompter textfield.

    This event handler passes ActionEvents to the ActionEvent handler.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameWindowController

      public GameWindowController​(ThatsLife game)
      This constructor creates an instance of the controller using the game parameter as its active game.
      Parameters:
      game - : ThatsLife - the active game model to be played.

  • Method Details

    • setActiveGame

      public void setActiveGame​(ThatsLife game)
      This method sets the game model to control.
      Parameters:
      game - : ThatsLife - game model to control.

    • handle

      public void handle​(javafx.event.Event ev)
      This event handler passes ActionEvents to the ActionEvent handler.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.Event>
      Parameters:
      ev - : Event

    • updatePlayerPos

      public void updatePlayerPos()
      This method updates the view with the current player positions at the time of calling. This method relies heavily on the the ThatsLife class' getPlayerString() method. It tokenizes and parses the string to extract the player's current space ID.

    • displayDecision

      public int displayDecision​(java.lang.String prompt, java.lang.String[] choices)
      This method shows an alert box that prompts the user to make a choice via a drop-down menu.
      Parameters:
      prompt - : The prompt string to present to the user.
      choices - : The String array that presents all the choices the user can make.
      Returns:
      An integer that is aligned with the index of the choices array that the player chose.

    • displayPrompt

      public void displayPrompt​(java.lang.String prompt)
      This method shows a prompt message to the user by printing it to the message prompter textfield.
      Parameters:
      prompt - : Message to print

    • displayAlert

      public void displayAlert​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String header, java.lang.String prompt, boolean willWait)
      This method displays an alert box based on the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      title - : String - the title of the alert box.
      header - : String - the header of the alert box.
      prompt - : String - the content text of the alert box.
      willWait - : boolean - Determined if the alert box should freeze the game until it is dismissed or not.
